events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and all initial documents are complete and well presented.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's software engineering background and relevant experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to this candidate to move forward with the screening process and coordinate further stages.
The initial screening was successful; the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in core software development principles and problem solving.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess coding skills and system design capabilities.
